name: Esthetic April O'neil 1987 (TMNT)
description:
I tried to make exactly the same April, in the selection of art only frames from the cartoon processed by AI, but this is not enough for good quality. So IMPORTANT TIPS:

1) DO NOT use standard denoising strength (better to use 0.6 or higher, because the quality of art in the sample is quite low)

2) In addition to the main april o'neil prompt, use: brown hair, orange hair (what do you like more), gray eyes, lips, short hair, yellow shirt (you can try yellow jumpsuit)- this helps to identify April

3) From myself - use prompt: hair over one eye, you will like it)

4) Negative prompts: (worst quality, low quality, extra digits:1.4), blurry foreground, blurry

I made a video on how to achieve the same quality or just repeat my art

P.S. If you want to support me, then you can subscribe to my Patreon and get builds earlier than they come out here (versions on patreon will always be newer by one than here) This will help me a lot in updating the video card over time to make models even better and faster (the main thing is better)

just use hires fix as much as your video card is capable of, so as not to give an error, with 8gb of video memory it is 512x768 with hires fix 2, upscaler Latent (nearest-exact), the picture will be much more detailed. If you want a style close to the original but with more detail, don't use Denoising strength above 0.6, but to avoid artifacts, do not use too low a value, optimally 0.5

LORA weight 0.5-0.6

CFG Scale - 5.5

Eta noise seed delta 31337


Use Abyssorangemix3aom3_aom3a3.safetensors With these negative prompts:
(worst quality, low quality, extra digits:1.4) or (worst quality, low quality:1.4)


Trigger Words: april o'neil

Optional trigger words: 1980s \(style\), brown hair, gray eyes, lips, lipstick, short hair, yellow shirt

Combined with my other LORA

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1 which is usually too high)

    *Information taken from Lykon

    Please post your work with or without comments, it will help me improve. Thanks!

    If you like my work, click on the heart above, I will be pleased :3
